channel.title: Comic-Con 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Comic-Con 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Coyote vs. Acme’ Debuts First Footage as Will Forte Reflects on Salvaged Film: “I Had Given Up Hope”
item.description: During its Comic-Con panel, the movie’s team celebrated the Looney Tunes feature finally getting a release date after it was scrapped by Warner Bros.

item.title: ‘Coyote vs. Acme’ Debuts First Footage as Will Forte Reflects on Salvaged Film: “I Had Given Up Hope”
item.description: During its Comic-Con panel, the movie’s team celebrated the Looney Tunes feature finally getting a release date after it was scrapped by Warner Bros.

item.title: “James Fraser Dies” in First ‘Outlander’ Season 8 Footage
item.description: Well, that’s one way to end the series.

item.title: “James Fraser Dies” in First ‘Outlander’ Season 8 Footage
item.description: Well, that’s one way to end the series.

item.title: ‘South Park’ Creators Reveal Network Battle Over Premiere’s Trump Penis as They Joke: “We’re Terribly Sorry”
item.description: Their Comic-Con panel took place the day after the controversial ‘South Park’ season 27 premiere earned the ire of President Donald Trump and showed a version of him lying naked in bed with Satan.

item.title: ‘South Park’ Creators Reveal Network Battle Over Premiere’s Trump Penis as They Joke: “We’re Terribly Sorry”
item.description: Their Comic-Con panel took place the day after the controversial ‘South Park’ season 27 premiere earned the ire of President Donald Trump and showed a version of him lying naked in bed with Satan.

item.title: ‘Spinal Tap II: The End Continues’ Trailer Sees the Lads Reunite for One Last Gig
item.description: The official clip debuted during a panel at San Diego Comic-Con.

item.title: ‘Percy Jackson and the Olympians’ Sets Season 2 Premiere, Casts Fan-Favorite Roles for Season 3
item.description: The Disney+ show also released a teaser for the coming season at Comic-Con.

item.title: From ‘South Park’ to George Lucas’ First Comic-Con: Inside the Most Anticipated Panels
item.description: No Marvel? No problem. Here are the Hall H offerings most likely to bring a jolt to San Diego this year.
